ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm... some good points, but what about this argument. YOUR twinking ruins MY game, that I pay for I m not making that argument, but I ve heard it said.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm... some good points, but what about this
argument. "YOUR twinking ruins MY game, that I pay for" I'm
not making that argument, but I've heard it said. The
point is, though, now those who don't like twinks can
go to other, newer servers-- ie. Sullon and Firiona,
where there is the TLC and only one char for that
server. Sure, there will always be those who get multiple
accounts so they can twink, but it will be less. <br><br>I
know it's not ALL twinks, and probably not even a
large percentage, but I've had problems with obvious
twinks farming, camp stealing, kill stealing, and other
things. Same or slightly leveled uber twinks can run in
and solo things that my hard found group is going
after. /rude on them!!! <br><br>BTW-- Firiona Vie is a
must try for those who like to play natural (ie. no
twinking). Each special weapon/armor piece is sacred AND you
don't skip by the great (and underutilized) quests in
many of the zones in favor of PLing and and spending
the hundreds of plat that a lvl 10 char would
normally not have. My level 14 rogue is very proud of his
mismatched collection of leather armor, 2 pieces of banded,
and the Freeport Militia Tunic!! <br><br>You are
right-- to each there own. That doesn't mean I have to
like it!! <br><br>Xela Orcbane<br>Druid of the 36th
season<br>Xev<br><br>Rumble<br>Rogue of the 14th Station<br>FV
